data.title: CBN and Regent University Online Courses
data.meta_description: Unlock a world of knowledge and opportunity with our comprehensive online courses offered through a collaboration between CBN and Regent University.
data.text:
About Our Courses

Taught by Regent University's accomplished scholars, our courses are designed to develop your knowledge and understanding from a Christian perspective. Immerse yourself in learning as you explore new topics at your own pace! Our courses include video lessons, optional quizzes, and additional downloadable resources. You can engage with all course elements on a computer, tablet, or other mobile device. Plus, your progress is automatically saved as you go, allowing you to learn at your own pace and return anytime. For each course you complete, you'll receive a certificate of completion from CBN and Regent University.
